name: Hell Punk Horror
storyline:
Strange creatures from hell roam the world in search for fresh souls.
To survive you'll need to utilize your surroundings and think outside the box.
You can fight your way using a wide array of weapons and moves or you can utilize the environment and quick thinking to avoid combat.

summary: Hell Punk Horror is a brutal first person roguelite-hybrid with creative and fluid melee combat. Explore a randomized interdimensional warehouse and escape using any means necessary. Use your wits and fight your way through an army of demons in this open-ended sandbox!
